Text: In the twelve years of operation there have been several hundred individuals involved with the twelve ownership groups, with group number thirteen currently forming. As Howard points out, LandMark groups never own 100 percent of a horse.
Cause: In the twelve years of operation there have been several hundred individuals involved with the twelve ownership groups, with group number thirteen currently forming.
Effect: As Howard points out, LandMark groups never own 100 percent of a horse.
